@title Ownable
@dev The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control
functions, this simplifies the implementation of "user permissions".
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error: Transaction sender is not allowed by the contract."

arguments.value: Error: Transaction sender is not allowed by the contract.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error: Transaction sender is not allowed by the contract."

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner
transferOwnership
allowOwnership
removeOwnership
